item.description: Holyoke Rows is offering a free open house from 9:00 - 11:00 a.m. to try out canoes, kayaks and rowing shells with instruction free of charge. They supply the equipment. Wear what you would wear mowing the lawn for this one: shorts, Tshirt, tennis shoes with sox or water shoes. Can bring/wear a bathing suit too. Rudds Ice Cream and Waterfront Tavern down the street if anyone's interested in letting the good time roll! Rain date 7/26.
item.how_to_find_us: It's not a big place, you'll see me in the parking lot.
item.name: Canoe Kayak River Instruction
